Html:
I would like to find if this is possible with GMap.NET control:
Suppose I have data in SQL Server and the data type of the field (geom) is Geometry.
Is it possible to display this using the GMap.NET control (with C#)?
I've seen that PointLatLng is always being used but how can it be used in this case?
Thanks in advance.
there is no function for that, but i reckon you can use the sql data and add the routes/polygons
